RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 1 350 Y Dirt CR: 71. Maiden Purse 19800. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs. non starters preferred.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CONCEALED KARIE dueled, proved best. ZIA dueled, outfinished, gamely. FOOL MOON RISING broke in, chased. RM POLITICAL ROSE steady bid, no threat. RVALIANT MOON FMF uneven course. EYE AM BIGTIME outrun. FLY SWEET FANCY ducked in start, steadied. DADDYSLITTLECOWGIRL reared start, off slowly. EYE APPEEL declared non-starter. Following a stewards' inquiry, EYE APPEEL was declared a non-starter.

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: S Rioux and J & M Laird

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 70. Allowance Purse 37000. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LET HIM BE raced between horses to the turn, dueled to the sixteenth pole and drew off. JED vied inside to the sixteenth pole, was no match late and finished second best. B R KIDD ROCK vied three across to the turn, dropped back, finished evenly and held for show. OL' MCCLINTOCK pressed the pace along the inside, dropped back into the turn and had no further response. FLAGS FINALE bumped at the start and raced mid pack in an even effort. READS PET ZENON broke out and bumped at the start, raced in the back and was not a factor. BIGG LIMO was outrun. DANJERUS STORM had brief speed only.

ENTRY.NAME: Danjerus Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed only, no threat, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Bigg Limo
ENTRY.OWNER: Medlin Billy R and Heldenbrand Ed L

ENTRY.NAME: Ol' McClintock
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, dropped back into turn, no further response

ENTRY.NAME: Jed
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside to 1/16, no match late, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Reads Pet Zenon
ENTRY.OWNER: Berry Glenn and Berry S Linda
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped, in the back, lacked a bid, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Flags Finale
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, mid pack, even effort

ENTRY.NAME: Let Him Be
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to turn, dueled to 1/16, drew off, best

ENTRY.NAME: B R Kidd Rock
ENTRY.OWNER: Brooks Rodney Brooks Marty and Reid Donnie
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3across to turn, dropped back, evenly late, held show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 3 550 Y Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 39200. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAT GOT A DIAMOND dueled throughout, best. KISS THE BABY dueled throughout. COPY ME FAST vied, outfinished, gamely. EBW MAGDALENA veered out after start. ROCASOLIDA ESPERANCE carried out after start. KNOCKOUT CHICK bobbled start, in contention, hung late. JESS LIKE A CHICK clear path, no bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Knockout Chick
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, in contention, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Kiss the Baby
ENTRY.OWNER: Ramirez Marco X and Hartstack Gary W

ENTRY.NAME: Rocasolida Esperance
ENTRY.OWNER: Bolen Bradley C and Clinger Cole M

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 76. Maiden Special Weight Purse 19800. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, AND FIVE YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LEGALLY REDDY raced close to the pace, challenged three across, dueled to the wire and prevailed. BLUE JEAN BOURBON moved up inside to challenge, dueled to the wire and was outfinished in a good effort. PARS AND BIRDIES stalked the pace, angled out on the turn, bid five wide, closed willingly and was gaining late. WHAT A MEMORY bumped at the start, dropped inside to save ground, bid four wide, closed well and didn't have enough late. SECOND BATTALION got away well, led early, fell back on the turn and finished evenly. LEAP YEAR NIGHT stalked the pace while racing outside, was carried out into the stretch, bid six wide and lacked a rally. KING BARON broke out and bumped at the start, raced inside and had brief speed only.

ENTRY.NAME: King Baron
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped, raced inside, brief speed only

ENTRY.NAME: What a Memory
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, dropped inside, 4wide top of lane, not enough late

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Jean Bourbon
ENTRY.OWNER: Champion Racing Stable and Sansone James Dominic
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up inside, dueled to wire, outfinished, good effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Second Battalion
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, led early, fell back turn, finished evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Pars and Birdies
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, angled out turn, 5wide bid, closed, gaining late

ENTRY.NAME: Leap Year Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside, carried out into stretch, 6wide bid, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Legally Reddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close, challenged 3across, dueled to wire, prevailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 5 330 Y Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 14900. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, AND FIVE YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. New Mexico Bred Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COUNTING STARS light bump start, dueled, gamely. JESS ONE HOT CHICK came out early, crowded rival. MIGHTY EAGLE drifted in, steady bid. DIAMOND BRIDGE vied, drifted in late, outnodded for show. ZOOMER ROCKET JESSE broke out, light bump. CHIKIBABY in contention, hung. MARRY JANE crowded early. NA CORONAS GIFT veered out early. FIRST OF FIRE squeezed, shut off, steadied. Following a stewards' inquiry, JESS ONE HOT CHICK was disqualified and placed ninth for causing interference in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Diamond Bridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, drifted in late, outnodded for show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 45. Maiden Special Weight Purse 22800. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, AND FIVE YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPEED BUMP BOB vied inside, drew off leaving the turn for a clear lead and held well. G G HENNESSY veered out at the start, lagged while racing outside, swung wide leaving the turn, closed well and was gaining late. ON YOUR LEFT vied two across, fell back leaving the turn, went evenly late and held for show. BIG D W settled off the pace, was within range and lacked a late response. DESERT PUNK raced mid pack and lacked a bid in an even effort. TOWN HEAT broke slowly, raced wide, trailed the field and passed a tiring rival. SMARTY'S BERTRANDO failed to contend in an inside trip and showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Smarty's Bertrando
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip, failed to contend, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Desert Punk
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, even effort, lacked a bid

ENTRY.NAME: Speed Bump Bob
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, drew off leaving turn, clear lead, held well,

ENTRY.NAME: Big D W
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, within range, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: On Your Left
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2across, fell back leaving turn, evenly late, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Town Heat
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, raced wide, trailed, passed tiring rival

ENTRY.NAME: G G Hennessy
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered out start, swung wide leaving turn, closed, gaining late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 7 350 Y Dirt CR: 83. Maiden Purse 19800. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs. non starters preferred.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DADS RACY TE held well, driving. IPHONE chased, drifted, gamely. BIG DADDYS GLASS came in start. LONG BRANCH clean trip. WOO SHES ON FIRE no mishap. KINGS SWEET MONEY mid pack, evenly. NOT TO BE TRUSTED veered in start. RUBYS KING GOTEM broke in, bumped, in tight early. COMO TU VIKE bumped start, in tight early. KING HI STRAIT drifted in, outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: King Hi Strait
ENTRY.OWNER: Brooks Joe Dee and Brooks Melanie

ENTRY.NAME: Rubys King Gotem
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bumped, in tight early

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 15200. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CLUE pressed the pace, bid between horses, fell back, awaited room, bid off the rail, closed willingly, got up late and won going away. GOLDEN MERGER was far back early, bid along the rail on the turn and closed inside to get up late for place. SMOOTH BLUES pressed the pace along the inside, assumed command on the turn, led to deep stretch and was outclosed. RAFAEL'S SURPRISE pressed the pace towards the outside, went five wide leaving the turn and lacked the needed late response. REEL EM IN set the pace to the turn, dropped back and gave way. ZESTY JAZZMAN was away alertly, vied early, pressed between horses and stopped on the turn. PHANTOMOFTHEOPERE was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth Blues
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, assumed command turn, led late, outclosed

ENTRY.NAME: Clue
ENTRY.OWNER: Centurion Racing Partners LLC and Cappellucci Dick
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, awaited room turn, bid off rail, up late,going away

ENTRY.NAME: Reel Em In
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace to turn, dropped back, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Rafael's Surprise
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside, 5wide leaving turn, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Zesty Jazzman
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, vied early, pressed between horses, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Merger
ENTRY.COMMENT: far back, bid rail turn, closed inside, up late for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 9 400 Y Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 33000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JESS SWEET CANDY broke in, vied, best. QUE BIEN steady close, gaining. CISCOS ZOOMIN EYE broke in, steady bid. THATS IT CHICK led late, outfinished. HS TRIGGER bobbled while away well, mid pack, evenly. AJ PRINCE no threat. BV DONT LOOK BACK broke awkwardly, no bid. PERKS FAVORITECARTEL outrun. SALUTE THE MAN broke slowly, crowded.

ENTRY.NAME: Jess Sweet Candy
ENTRY.OWNER: Flores Rudy T Flores Daniel and Flores Michael

ENTRY.NAME: Hs Trigger
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled while away well, mid pack, evenly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 10 350 Y Dirt CR: 75. Maiden Purse 22800. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, AND FIVE YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MR JAMES ROCKET clear early, best. MANYSHADESOFGRAY steady close, 2nd best. TITLE WAVVE in tight early. FEATURED LIBERTY no mishap. QUEEN OF THE JINGLE stumbled start, bumped. JESS MAKES MONEY bumped start, in tight early. LOVE OF CARTEL KK no factor. LA JULY broke awkwardly, outrun. GALLIVANT AR broke in, squeezed, ducked in sharply.

ENTRY.NAME: Jess Makes Money
ENTRY.OWNER: Rivas Amado S and Harse Chris J

ENTRY.NAME: Gallivant Ar
